desc: Beautiful colourful gifts accessories and handicrafts made in India and sold in the UK Bags and scarves throws and cushions gifts hippie boho clothing elephants Indian silver jewellery frames accessories homewares and reclaimed wooden Indian furniture.

layout.text: Please note our shop in Cricklade is closed from 30 th June for two weeks, re-opening Thursday 14th July. Apologies for any inconvenience 🙏
